document_data.title: Foreign Affairs
document_data.story arc:
[[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]]
Storm King’s Descent
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Foreign Affairs''''', designed by [[Greg Marks]] and [[Ginny Loveday]], is an adventure in the [[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]] storyline published for the [[Adventurers League]]. It is the first part of the Storm King’s Descent series. 

{{Quote|''An invitation to the storm giant court of King Hekaton becomes a continent-spanning mystery that could change the face of Faerûn.''{{Cite adventurers league/Foreign Affairs|1}}|}}
